1506040.name: The Land of Shadows : Asylum
1506040.description:
In The land of Shadows: Asylum, the player is plunged into a captivating psychological horror game where he follows the story of Alex, a young boy investigator specializing in unexplained cases.
Discover an old psychiatric asylum abandoned in your first investigation.
In the blink of an eye, we quickly find ourselves trapped inside, with the terrible secrets behind these walls.

STRONG POINTS
First Person Action: Embodying Alex, players experience first person the environment.

Immersive experience:

Realistic graphics and sounds along with a minimal user interface ensure a fully immersive experience that will keep you on your toes.

Wandering Spirit:

Get to know the locals. Help will be provided, but not without return...


Souvenir:

delve into the memories of the deceased, a former psychiatric asylum patient. And look for clues to help you, and help those in need.

Adult content

Some parts of the game can have an effect of surprises or fear. (ghostly appearance) - ( Monstrosity).
